::Zardus/Mosquitor::

Zardus watches Aelo fall into stasis lock, smiling and firing two energy-draining missiles at the ground near Ocipite. The missiles flashed into a blue field of anti-energy energy, and then dissapeared, though if it caught Ocipite in it, it would most likely weaken her for a few seconds.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor laughs wildly, jumping down off the entrance and firing his acid in a scream at Ocipite.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry I hope that this post has more sence.
> 
> Aelo/Ocipite
> 
> Aleo used her wing to protect herself of Mosquitor's acyd and it 
> started to burn her wing, she moved with pain and like a mirror 
> Ocipite did the same. The combined attacked of Mosquitor, Zardus, 
> Hurricane was enough to Aelo, who fell in stasis lock.
> 
> Ocipite avoided most of the shots of Wheeljack and Hurricane's 
> Lightning bolt when she saw Aelo fell in stasis lock she knew that 
> she was lost; she started to look a round searching a exit... but she 
> was surrounded by enemies.
> 
> Just a thing could help her... It was a small chance but could help 
> her...
> 
> She started to concentrate most of the energy-weapons that she had... 
> a strange pale-blue shine started to appear in her hands...
